name: Fun at the Beach
description:
Info before playing the game

This is a game I have made for a Game Jam where the theme is on the beach. The whole point of the Jam is to make a game with crappy artwork. Please note – the story is very bare bone and isn’t my strong point.

Controls

WASD – Control Player

Space – Jump

ESC – Escape

Q – Drag/ Pull objects

H – Health Potions

Left Click – Attack

E - Interact
